description:
At one time it was thought that:

 * extensions to nova would live outside of nova
 * openstack.compute would be the client

With those assumptions we created https://github.com/cloudbuilders/openstackx - and rebuild the dashboard to use those.

We need to deprecate and move our code over to this project & nova core (then patch dashboard to use nova-client)
title: port cloudbuilders/openstackx to nova & nova-client

comments.content:
At one time it was thought that:

 * extensions to nova would live outside of nova
 * openstack.compute would be the client

With those assumptions we created https://github.com/cloudbuilders/openstackx - and rebuild the dashboard to use those.

We need to deprecate and move our code over to this project & nova core (then patch dashboard to use nova-client)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~q-noreply

comments.content: The issue was adressed outside of this bug.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
